description: In a room featuring a large bathtub, an elderly woman stands on a step ladder pointing sternly at a sitting cat. Inside the oversized tub, a shark's fin and part of its body are visible, suggesting it occupies the space typically used for bathing. The scene presents an absurd domestic scenario where a dangerous predator is treated as a household pet, highlighted by the woman's protective warning towards the cat.
caption: “And remember—I don’t want to catch you bothering the fish!”
